title: Dev Services for MongoDB
summary: Quarkus provides a feature known as Dev Services that facilitates the automatic startup and configuration of MongoDB in development and testing environments, without requiring explicit connection configuration. This feature uses Testcontainers to run a MongoDB instance. Dev Services for MongoDB supports sharing a single MongoDB instance across multiple Quarkus applications in development mode via a service discovery mechanism but requires explicit configuration in production environments within the `application.properties` using the `%prod.` profile.
